name: Block Beats
description: Block Beats is an innovative Minecraft Bedrock Edition mod that enables players to bring custom audio into their worlds using redstone mechanics.

scripts.copy:assets: cp -R animation_controllers/ animations entities/ blocks/ items/ functions/ CHANGELOG.md LICENSE manifest.json pack_icon.png README.md build
scripts.build: ./node_modules/typescript/bin/tsc -p tsconfig.json; npm run copy:assets; npm run copy:vanilla-data
scripts.dist: npm run clean; npm run format; npm run build; cd build; zip -0 -r RecordBox-v${npm_package_version}.mcpack .
scripts.mkdir_win: @if exist build (rd /s /q build && mkdir build) else (mkdir build)
scripts.build_win: npm run mkdir_win 1>nul && node node_modules\typescript\bin\tsc -p tsconfig.json && npm run copy_assets_win 1>nul && npm run copy:win-vanilla-data 1>nul
scripts.build_win_noscript: npm run mkdir_win 1>nul && npm run copy_assets_win 1>nul
scripts.zip_win: npm run clean_win && npm run build_win && cd build && node -e "const path = require('path'); const arch = process.arch.startsWith('arm') ? 'arm64' : (process.arch === 'x32' ? 'ia32' : 'x64'); const executable = path.join(__dirname, '..', 'node_modules', '7zip-bin', 'win', arch, '7za'); require('child_process').execSync(`${executable} a -tzip RecordBox-v%npm_package_version%.zip .`);"
scripts.dist_win: npm run clean_win && npm run format && npm run build_win 1>nul && npm run zip_win 1>nul && powershell -Command "Rename-Item -Path 'build\RecordBox-v%npm_package_version%.zip' -NewName 'RecordBox-v%npm_package_version%.mcpack'"
